p: AC and BC are prime bases for VA; they metabolize to retinol in humans. Fruits and vegetables with orange, yellow, and green color are rich source of these two carotenoids (Saini, Nile, & Park, 2015). The VA conversion efficacy of BC is double in comparison with AC, one portion of BC yields two portions of retinol, but AC yields only half portion (Thurnham, 2007). Due to the large concentrations of the BC shares with AC in plant sources, its medicinal values are not well established (Murakoshi et al., 1992).
